title: SJIF&R Announces 2024 Structure/Wildland Firefighting Academy Dates
body:
Hybrid academy with hands-on skills weekends beginning January 6th. Graduating participants will be fully qualified as structure and wildland firefighters by tend of academy March 31st.(o

If you are interested, please complete a 

[Volunteer Application](/assets/images/volunteer-application.pdf)

and submit via email or in person to:

San Juan Island Fire & Rescue
1011 Mullis St.
Email: kkuetzing@sjifire.org


Applications must be received by close of business October 31st.
